title: Samaritan Bio
description: Building AI-powered biomarker intelligence for the human body, starting with the world's most accessible biofluid.

founders.name: Raghav Behl
founders.bio: BS ECE, MS AI — Carnegie Mellon University. Software consultant. Ex-Merkle Science, Ex-Inzane Labs.

founders.name: Karan Rao
founders.bio: BS ECE — Carnegie Mellon University. Entrepreneur (Swachh). Technology consultant. Ex-VC.

advisors.name: Dr. Anshul Singh
advisors.bio: Asst. Professor, Dept. of Anesthesiology, AIIMS New Delhi.

demo.heading: Want to see how AroBag works?
demo.body: Book a meeting with our team to learn how AroBag can transform kidney monitoring in your ICU.

pilot.heading: Interested in piloting AroBag?
pilot.body: We're looking for forward-thinking hospitals to join our pilot programme. Register your interest today.

investor.heading: Building the foundational model for the human body
investor.body: Samaritan is raising its next round. Get in touch to learn about the opportunity.

careers.heading: Help build the future of kidney care
careers.body: We're hiring engineers, researchers, and operators who want to make a dent in critical care.

newsletter.heading: Follow our journey
newsletter.body: Get updates on our clinical trials, product development, and the latest in biomarker science.
